name: James Binns, Respondent, v. Mary E. S. Williams, as Executrix, etc., Appellant

parties: James Binns, Respondent, v. Mary E. S. Williams, as Executrix, etc., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Miller, J.,
reads for affirmance; Earl and Daneorth, JJ.; concur; Andrews, Ch. J.-, and Finch, J., concur in result; Tract, J., took no part; Rapallo, J., absent
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Miller, J.,
